They don't seem to have any connection prior to him confessing to her and getting to fuck her...yet, even before that she seemed oddly mindful of him. Saving a chocolate for him, calling out to him out of nowhere when they're not even friends, etc. It's almost like she's interested in him...yet doesn't let him kiss her when they're fucking. So odd....

@FirekeeperIsMyGoddess You're an idiot. Nothing said she fake moans, nor is that given as the reason he cried at the end. Also, the MC has clearly always been interested in her...hence him checking her Twitter account and constantly watching her. The whole "I don't like her" was just him trying to lie to himself after finding out she's already fucking the professor.

The girl fake moans, so that's the reason why you're crying, you fucking loser? I mean, yeah it is painful to hear your girl not enjoying the sex but he should've overlooked through this. If my girl ever fake moaned, she'll be finding another man. He knew that their love would be unrequited and she won't return the same 'feelings', because the only one that has lust is the MC and they both don't lust for one another.
